channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: How much would it cost to reduce class size by one student?
item.description: How much would it cost to reduce class size by one student? by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Thursday 31 January 2019 at 6:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Hungary 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Hungary 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 31 January 2019 at 9:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 31 January 2019 at 9:00.

item.title: Strength through diversity’s Spotlight Report for Sweden
item.description: Strength through diversity’s Spotlight Report for Sweden by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Friday 1 February 2019 at 9:00.

item.title: Impacts of technology use on children - Exploring literature on the brain, cognition and well-being
item.description: Impacts of technology use on children - Exploring literature on the brain, cognition and well-being by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday 4 February 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Slovak Republic 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Slovak Republic 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 5 February 2019 at 10:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 5 February 2019 at 10:00.

item.title: Getting Skills Right: Future-Ready Adult Learning Systems
item.description: Getting Skills Right: Future-Ready Adult Learning Systems by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday 13 February 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 13 February 2019 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Rethinking Innovation for a Sustainable Ocean Economy
item.description: Rethinking Innovation for a Sustainable Ocean Economy by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Thursday 14 February 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 14 February 2019 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: How's Life in the Digital Age? - Opportunities and Risks of the Digital Transformation for People's Well-being
item.description: How's Life in the Digital Age? - Opportunities and Risks of the Digital Transformation for People's Well-being by Statistics and Data Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 26 February 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 26 February 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Going Digital Synthesis Report - Making Digital Transformation Work for Growth and Well-being
item.description: Going Digital Synthesis Report - Making Digital Transformation Work for Growth and Well-being by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Monday 11 March 2019 at 9:00 and a launch event planned on Monday 11 March 2019 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: Measuring the Digital Transformation
item.description: Measuring the Digital Transformation by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Monday 11 March 2019 at 9:00 and a launch event planned on Monday 11 March 2019 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry
